credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Design for a Mantelpiece
provenance: Ex-Collection: Giovanni Piancastelli; Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
medium: Pen and black ink; brush and brown and gray wash; black chalk
description: Front view of a mantelpiece with frieze of decorative figures . Additional ornamentation is added on right half, including a winged gryphon at lower right.
name: Drawing
